articles.author: Tim Hepher, Mathieu Rosemain
articles.title: France's Thales to buy Imperva in $3.6 bln cybersecurity deal - Reuters
articles.description: France's Thales (TCFP.PA) said on Tuesday it would buy U.S. cybersecurity company Imperva in a deal worth $3.6 billion as it steps up expansion outside its historic defence busine…
articles.content: PARIS, July 25 (Reuters) - France's Thales (TCFP.PA) said on Tuesday it would buy U.S. cybersecurity company Imperva in a deal worth $3.6 billion as it steps up expansion outside its historic defence… [+3103 chars]
